author: Matt Mathers, Matt Mathers
title: Coronavirus: Claridge's offers free rooms to NHS workers unable to stay home during pandemic
description: Up to 40 workers at St Mary's Hospital in Paddington will be able to stay at the hotel from Friday
content:
Free accommodation has been offered to London NHS workers by Claridges hotel to help staff unable to live at home during the coronavirus pandemic.
The five-star hotel said it is opening its doors to 40 doctors, nurses and other key staff based in London from… [+1456 chars]
